targets.expr: (sum(task_wss_referenced_bytes{node=~"$node"}) by (node) /  sum(platform_dimm_total_size_bytes{dimm_type="ram", node=~"$node"}) by (node))  or sum(platform_dimm_total_size_bytes{dimm_type="ram", node=~"$node"}) by (node) * 0
